parameter.name: sql1
parameter.value: select "products"."name" as "product.name", "orders"."customer" as "product.customer.name", "orders"."quantity" * "products"."price" as "product.customer.bill" from "products", "orders" where "products"."name" = "orders"."product"

parameter.name: sql2
parameter.value: select "orders"."department" as "_index", "orders"."customer" as "_id", "orders"."customer" as "contact.customer", "employees"."name" as "contact.employee" from "orders" left join "employees" on "orders"."department" = "employees"."department"

parameter.name: sql3
parameter.value: select "products"."name" as "product.name", "orders"."customer" as "product.customer.name", "orders"."quantity" * "products"."price" as "product.customer.bill" from "products", "orders" where "products"."name" = "orders"."product" and "orders"."quantity" * "products"."price" > ?

parameter.name: sql4
parameter.value: select "products"."name" as "product.name", "orders"."customer" as "product.customer.name", "orders"."quantity" * "products"."price" as "product.customer.bill" from "products", "orders" where "products"."name" = "orders"."product" and extract(day from ("orders"."created" - to_timestamp(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) > 14
